title: Japanese Wear Watch Face
summary: Japanese Watch for Android Wear. It shows time&date on Japanese kanji characters
description: Japanese Watch for Android Wear. It shows time and date on Japanese kanji characters. We have included a premium version option in order to support android wear development. It lets you choose between nine nice backgrounds more Japan inspired.Compatible with square and rounded android wear watches.Tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and LG Watch.
descriptionHTML:
Japanese Watch for Android Wear. It shows time and date on Japanese kanji characters.

We have included a premium version option in order to support android wear development. It lets you choose between nine nice backgrounds more Japan inspired.

Compatible with square and rounded android wear watches.
Tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and LG Watch.
comments: Love the art wish it had more and 12 hour Nice app love it wish it had more art more options for the font for the small time and also 12 hour option too. Some of the pictures you can't even see the clock.
Update please Please add more high quality backgrounds, and the ability to change to 12 hour time. Arigato gozaiimasu!
I wish I could add a custom wallpaper (in the paid version).   I loved the app, please keep it updated! :)

Neutral Probably i can't use it or set it up wrong, am using cperia Z Ultra with SW2. Is it compatible? Just can't seem to change my watchface. N ots a paid app. If it was free, i wouldn't have bothered. Help??
Glad it finally got round watch support Looks good
